channel.title: Hosting problem on my own pc
channel.description:
Hello,
Since VPSLAND is not running port 43594 anymore, I run it for a while on my pc.
But i portforwarden fine, and everybody can connect. But every1 is using my pc ip. (Example fight247.home.nl)
So i login "Fight247 has logged in [fight247.home.nl) Somebody logs in "Player had logged in [fight247.home.nl)
What to do?
,Thanks

item.title: Hosting problem on my own pc
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

Hello,

Since VPSLAND is not running port 43594 anymore,
I run it for a while on my pc.

But i portforwarden fine, and everybody can connect.
But every1 is using my pc ip. (Example fight247.home.nl)

So i login "Fight247 has logged in [fight247.home.nl)
Somebody logs in "Player had logged in [fight247.home.nl)

What to do?

,Thanks
